svg.desc:
Configurable Graph Paper
set script variables w - width h - height u1 - units per main grid line u2 - units per fine grid line c1 - color of main grid lines c2 - color of fine grid lines
or pass them in the url i.e. graphpaper.svg?w=500&h=500&u1=50&u2=10&c1=black&c2=gray Use c=color to set both c1 & c2
Jay Nick steamcoded.org
